articles.description: Latest football news and reaction to the Champions League quarter-finals as Arsenal and Man City draw with Bayern Munich and Real Madrid respectively, as well as news from the Women's European Championship qualifiers.
articles.title: Reaction as Arsenal and Man City both held to draws in Champions League

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel says Bayern Munich were denied a penalty by a "kid's mistake", while one pundit describes Arsenal not being awarded a spot-kick as "quite alarming".
articles.title: 'A kid's mistake' - were Arsenal and Bayern denied clear penalties?

articles.description: Holders Manchester City and Real Madrid share six goals in a thriller at the Bernabeu to leave their Champions League quarter-final evenly poised.
articles.title: Man City and Real Madrid evenly poised after classic

articles.description: The Masters: Will Rory McIlroy finally win at Augusta?
articles.title: The Masters: Will Rory McIlroy finally win at Augusta?

articles.description: Britain's most successful gymnast Max Whitlock says it "feels right" to announce that he will retire after the Olympics this summer.
articles.title: Max Whitlock to retire after Paris 2024 Olympics

articles.description: Former England midfielder Danny Murphy says he became addicted to cocaine after his playing career ended.
articles.title: Ex-Liverpool midfielder Murphy was addicted to cocaine

articles.description: Spanish tennis player Aaron Cortes is banned from the sport until 2039 by the International Tennis Integrity Agency after admitting to corruption charges.
articles.title: Spanish tennis player Aaron Cortes banned to 2039 for corruption

articles.description: Leah Williamson says she felt "10 times taller and 10 times stronger" making her England return for the first time in a year in their victory over the Republic of Ireland.
articles.title: Williamson felt '10 times taller' on England return

articles.description: Ruben Amorim is being strongly linked with Liverpool, so what is the style of Sporting Lisbon's coach and could he be the right man to replace Jurgen Klopp?
articles.title: 'A similar approach to Klopp' - lowdown on Amorim

articles.description: World champion Luke Humphries is beaten in the final of the eighth Players Championship event following Luke Littler's early exit.
articles.title: Players Championship: Luke Humphries beaten in final after Luke Littler's early exit
